Sentencas: Micro-scale solid oxide fuel cells (mu-SOFCs) constitute a promising power generation technology for portable devices such as aerospace exploration, medical devices and consumer electronics.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Fuel cell systems include several functional units providing gas reforming, electrochemical power generation, and post-combustion of unused fuel.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: All such units require operation at controlled temperature with appropriate gases.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Although various mu-SOFC components have been demonstrated, the evaluation of the thermal balance is cumbersome, as there is no micro platform providing thermal insulation, controlled heating, temperature control, and gas exchange.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Our testing platform is designed for this purpose.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: It consists of two sealed glass substrates with integrated platinum thermistors for heating and temperature control, and channels to supply and evacuate gases.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Its fabrication is compatible with silicon chip bonding.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: The heating elements are thick-film platinum thermistors allowing to heat up to 700 degrees C. Efficient thermal decoupling along the carrier allows convenient low-temperature electrical and fluidic connections.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: A fluidic MEMS module - a prototype gas reformer - was bonded onto the carrier to demonstrate tight gas connections at elevated temperature.
Titulo: A micro heater platform with fluid channels for testing micro-solid oxide fuel cell components
